mds-currency-rate-import-ecb
============================
Tryton module for periodically importing exchange rates of 
the EURO from the ECB.

Install
=======

pip install mds-currency-rate-import-ecb

Requires
========
- Tryton 5.4

Changes
=======

*5.4.1 - 13.10.2020*

- fix: added icon-directory to setup

*5.4.0 - 24.07.2020*

- init
